overview: Nightwalkers is three tales of revenge from the grave as told by the town historian. "The Initiation" involves a fraternity prank gone wrong as three friends accidentally kill someone and face a vengeful zombie. "The Family Friend" finds three drug smuggling punks taking a wrong turn and ending up in a farming community haunted by a killer scarecrow. Finally, in "Nia: Undying Love" a scorned woman gets revenge on her ex-boyfriend from beyond the grave.
tagline: Don't get caught in Pumpkin Hollow at night!
title: Nightwalkers
